languages.text: "На {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфоле{/g} это несложно. С год поработала на старину Кристо — отважный был воин, погиб в стычке с орками — затем переняла его дела. Когда есть голова на плечах и {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Великий{/g} в душе, нужные связи появляются быстро. Со временем собрала рядом верных и честных людей, и после нескольких удачных контрактов нас приметила Касбаллика. А вскоре я совсем осела на Футфоле и начала делиться мудростью с подопечными да подчиненными — самой мне руки марать расхотелось".

traits.locale_text: "На {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфоле{/g} это несложно. С год поработала на старину Кристо — отважный был воин, погиб в стычке с орками — затем переняла его дела. Когда есть голова на плечах и {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Великий{/g} в душе, нужные связи появляются быстро. Со временем собрала рядом верных и честных людей, и после нескольких удачных контрактов нас приметила Касбаллика. А вскоре я совсем осела на Футфоле и начала делиться мудростью с подопечными да подчиненными — самой мне руки марать расхотелось".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "It's not hard to do on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. I spent a year working for good old Cristo — he was a brave soldier who gave up the ghost in a scuffle with Orks — and then took over his business. Having a good head on your shoulders and keeping the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} in your heart helps to establish new contacts quickly. Eventually I gathered together a group of honest and loyal people, and it only took a few successful contracts for the Kasballica to take notice. I quickly settled on Footfall and started dispensing my wisdom to my proteges and subordinates — I lost the taste for getting my hands dirty."
languages.original_text: "На {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфоле{/g} это несложно. С год поработала на старину Кристо — отважный был воин, погиб в стычке с орками — затем переняла его дела. Когда есть голова на плечах и {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Великий{/g} в душе, нужные связи появляются быстро. Со временем собрала рядом верных и честных людей, и после нескольких удачных контрактов нас приметила Касбаллика. А вскоре я совсем осела на Футфоле и начала делиться мудростью с подопечными да подчиненными — самой мне руки марать расхотелось".

traits.locale_text: "It is anything but difficult at Footfall. I spent a year working for good old Cristo — he was a brave soldier who gave up the ghost in a scuffle with orks at Lacristi — and then took over his business. Having a good head on your shoulders and keeping the Great One in your heart helps to establish new contacts quickly. Eventually I gathered a group of honest and loyal people, and it only took a few successful contracts for Kasballica to take notice. I quickly settled in Footfall and started dispensing my wisdom wards and subordinates — I lost the taste for getting my own hands dirty."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “在{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}，这种事情没什么难的。我花了一年的时间为老好人克里斯托工作。他是个勇敢的士兵，和兽人混战的时候丧了命，于是我便接管了他的生意。只要保护好自己的脑袋别掉，把{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}至高无上的神皇{/g}放在心里，就有助于迅速认识新的伙伴。到了最后，我聚集了一群诚实而忠诚的人。我仅仅做了几笔成功的交易，就引起了卡斯巴利卡的注意。很快，我便在落脚港安顿下来，将我的智慧传授给我的门徒与下属。到了那个时候，我已经不再需要亲自弄脏手了。”
languages.original_text: "It's not hard to do on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. I spent a year working for good old Cristo — he was a brave soldier who gave up the ghost in a scuffle with Orks — and then took over his business. Having a good head on your shoulders and keeping the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} in your heart helps to establish new contacts quickly. Eventually I gathered together a group of honest and loyal people, and it only took a few successful contracts for the Kasballica to take notice. I quickly settled on Footfall and started dispensing my wisdom to my proteges and subordinates — I lost the taste for getting my hands dirty."

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "It's not hard to do on Footfall. I spent a year working for good old Cristo — he was a brave soldier who gave up the ghost in a scuffle with Orks — and then took over his business. Having a good head on your shoulders and keeping the Exalted One in your heart helps to establish new contacts quickly. Eventually I gathered together a group of honest and loyal people, and it only took a few successful contracts for the Kasballica to take notice. I quickly settled on Footfall and started dispensing my wisdom to my proteges and subordinates — I lost the taste for getting my hands dirty."

languages.text: «No es difícil entrar desde {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}. Pasé un año trabajando para el bueno de Cristo, un valeroso soldado que palmó en una reyerta con orkos, y después se quedó con su negocio. Tener buena cabeza y mantener al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exaltado{/g} en tu corazón ayuda a establecer nuevos contactos rápido. Con el tiempo, reuní una panda de gente honesta y leal, y bastó un puñado de contratos provechosos para que la Kasballica se fijara en nosotros. Me asenté en Paso al momento y empecé a ofrecer mi sabiduría a mis protegidos y subordinados; se me quitaron las ganas de ensuciarme las manos».
languages.original_text: "It's not hard to do on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. I spent a year working for good old Cristo — he was a brave soldier who gave up the ghost in a scuffle with Orks — and then took over his business. Having a good head on your shoulders and keeping the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} in your heart helps to establish new contacts quickly. Eventually I gathered together a group of honest and loyal people, and it only took a few successful contracts for the Kasballica to take notice. I quickly settled on Footfall and started dispensing my wisdom to my proteges and subordinates — I lost the taste for getting my hands dirty."

traits.locale_text: «No es difícil entrar desde {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}. Pasé un año trabajando para el bueno de Cristo, un valeroso soldado que palmó en una reyerta con orkos, y después se quedó con su negocio. Tener buena cabeza y mantener al {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exaltado{/g} en tu corazón ayuda a establecer nuevos contactos rápido. Con el tiempo, reuní una panda de gente honesta y leal, y bastó un puñado de contratos provechosos para que la Kasballica se fijara en nosotros. Me asenté en Paso al momento y empecé a ofrecer mi sabiduría a mis protegidos y subordinados; se me quitaron las ganas de ensuciarme las manos».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}では難しいことじゃない。アタシは善良な老人、クリストの下で1年間働いた…彼はオルクとのいさかいで命を落とした勇敢な兵士だった…そして彼のビジネスを引き継いだんだ。優れた頭脳を持ち、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}エグザルテッド・ワン{/g}を心に秘めていれば、新しい人脈をすぐに築くことができる。やがてアタシは誠実で忠実な仲間を集め、カスバリカが注目するようになるまで数回の契約を成功させた。アタシはすぐにフットフォールに根を下ろして、弟子や部下に知恵を授けるようになったってわけ…自分で手を汚す楽しみはなくしまったけどね」
languages.original_text: "It's not hard to do on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. I spent a year working for good old Cristo — he was a brave soldier who gave up the ghost in a scuffle with Orks — and then took over his business. Having a good head on your shoulders and keeping the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} in your heart helps to establish new contacts quickly. Eventually I gathered together a group of honest and loyal people, and it only took a few successful contracts for the Kasballica to take notice. I quickly settled on Footfall and started dispensing my wisdom to my proteges and subordinates — I lost the taste for getting my hands dirty."

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}では難しいことじゃない。アタシは善良な老人、クリストの下で1年間働いた…彼はオルクとのいさかいで命を落とした勇敢な兵士だった…そして彼のビジネスを引き継いだんだ。優れた頭脳を持ち、{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}エグザルテッド・ワン{/g}を心に秘めていれば、新しい人脈をすぐに築くことができる。やがてアタシは誠実で忠実な仲間を集め、カスバリカが注目するようになるまで数回の契約を成功させた。アタシはすぐにフットフォールに根を下ろして、弟子や部下に知恵を授けるようになったってわけ…自分で手を汚す楽しみはなくしまったけどね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Auf {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} ist das nicht schwer. Der gute alte Cristo war ein mutiger Soldat, der sein Leben im Kampf gegen Orks verloren hat. Ich habe ein Jahr für ihn gearbeitet und dann sein Geschäft übernommen. Wenn man einigermaßen Grips hat und den {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Erhabenen{/g} im Herzen trägt, kann man schnell neue Kontakte knüpfen. Ich hatte bald eine Gruppe ehrlicher, loyaler Leute versammelt, und es waren nur ein paar erfolgreiche Aufträge nötig, um die Kasballica auf uns aufmerksam zu machen. Ich habe mich schnell auf Footfall eingelebt und angefangen, meine Weisheit an meine Schützlinge und Untergebenen weiterzugeben — mir war nicht mehr danach, mir selbst die Hände schmutzig zu machen."
languages.original_text: "It's not hard to do on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. I spent a year working for good old Cristo — he was a brave soldier who gave up the ghost in a scuffle with Orks — and then took over his business. Having a good head on your shoulders and keeping the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} in your heart helps to establish new contacts quickly. Eventually I gathered together a group of honest and loyal people, and it only took a few successful contracts for the Kasballica to take notice. I quickly settled on Footfall and started dispensing my wisdom to my proteges and subordinates — I lost the taste for getting my hands dirty."

Ich habe ein Jahr für ihn gearbeitet und dann sein Geschäft übernommen. Wenn man einigermaßen Grips hat und den {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Erhabenen{/g} im Herzen trägt, kann man schnell neue Kontakte knüpfen. Ich hatte bald eine Gruppe ehrlicher, loyaler Leute versammelt, und es waren nur ein paar erfolgreiche Aufträge nötig, um die Kasballica auf uns aufmerksam zu machen. Ich habe mich schnell auf Footfall eingelebt und angefangen, meine Weisheit an meine Schützlinge und Untergebenen weiterzugeben — mir war nicht mehr danach, mir selbst die Hände schmutzig zu machen."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « À {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g}, c'est presque un jeu d'enfant. J'ai passé un an à travailler pour ce bon vieux Cristo, un brave soldat qui s'est fait tuer lors d'une bagarre contre des Orks, puis j'ai repris son affaire. Quand on a la tête sur les épaules et qu'on garde l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalté{/g} dans son cœur, on n'a aucun mal à nouer de nouvelles relations. Je me suis entourée de gens honnêtes et loyaux, et il nous a suffi de quelques contrats réussis pour attirer l'attention de la Kasballica. Je me suis ensuite installée à Castel pour de bon, puis j'ai commencé à dispenser ma sagesse à mes protégés et mes subalternes. Je n'avais plus envie de me salir les mains. »
languages.original_text: "It's not hard to do on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. I spent a year working for good old Cristo — he was a brave soldier who gave up the ghost in a scuffle with Orks — and then took over his business. Having a good head on your shoulders and keeping the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} in your heart helps to establish new contacts quickly. Eventually I gathered together a group of honest and loyal people, and it only took a few successful contracts for the Kasballica to take notice. I quickly settled on Footfall and started dispensing my wisdom to my proteges and subordinates — I lost the taste for getting my hands dirty."

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman'da{/g} hiç zor şey değil. Bir yıl kadar eski dostum Cristo'ya çalıştım. Cesur bir askerdi, Orklarla giriştiği kavgada nalları dikti. O ölünce işini ben devraldım. Omuzlarının üstünde iyi bir kafa, kalbinde de {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Görkemli{/g} varsa yeni bir çevre edinmek o kadar da uzun sürmüyor. Zaman içinde kendime dürüst ve sadık insanlardan oluşan bir ekip kurdum. Birkaç başarılı kontrat tamamladıktan sonra Kasballica'nın radarına girdik. Hızla Binliman'a yerleştim, çıraklar ve astlar eğittim. Kısa sürede ellerimi kirletmenin nasıl bir his olduğunu unuttum."
languages.original_text: "It's not hard to do on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}. I spent a year working for good old Cristo — he was a brave soldier who gave up the ghost in a scuffle with Orks — and then took over his business. Having a good head on your shoulders and keeping the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} in your heart helps to establish new contacts quickly. Eventually I gathered together a group of honest and loyal people, and it only took a few successful contracts for the Kasballica to take notice. I quickly settled on Footfall and started dispensing my wisdom to my proteges and subordinates — I lost the taste for getting my hands dirty."

traits.locale_text: "{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g}'da zor bir şey değil. Bir yıl boyunca eski dostum Cristo'ya çalıştım. Orklarla girdiği bir kavgada nalları diken cesur bir askerdi. Öldükten sonra işini ben devraldım. Omuzlarının üstünde iyi bir kafa, kalbinde de {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Görkemli{/g} varsa yeni bir çevre edinmek o kadar da uzun sürmüyor. Zaman içinde kendime dürüst ve sadık insanlardan oluşan bir grup kurdum ve birkaç başarılı kontrat tamamladıktan sonra Kasballica'nın radarına girdik. Hızla Binliman'a yerleştim ve çıraklar ve astlar eğittim. Kısa sürede ellerimi kirletmenin nasıl bir his olduğunu unutmuştum bile."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
